channel.title: math.HO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.HO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Bernard Maskit Memorial Tribute
item.description: arXiv:2512.19754v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This is an expanded version of the Maskit memorial tribute that appeared in the August 2025 issue of the Notices of the AMS.
item.dc:creator: James W. Anderson, Ara Basmajian, Ruben Hidalgo, Perry Susskind, Edward C. Taylor

item.title: The Rogers--Ramanujan continued fraction
item.description: arXiv:2512.19952v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: The primary purpose of this paper is to provide a survey of properties, values, identities, and generalizations of the Rogers--Ramanujan continued fraction, which is closely related to the Rogers--Ramanujan identities. Many of these results are found in Ramanujan's first two letters to Hardy, Ramanujan's notebooks, and his lost notebook. Short historical accounts are provided for both the notebooks and lost notebook.
item.dc:creator: Bruce C. Berndt, \"Ors Reb\'ak
